title: Speaking American: How Y'all, Youse, and You Guys Talk: A Visual Guide
description: Did you know that your answers to just a handful of questions can predict the zip code of where you grew up? Speaking American offers a visual atlas of the American vernacular--who says what, and where they say it--revealing the history of our nation, our regions, and the language that divides and unites us.
author: Josh    Katz
